issue.title: gazebo6 always crashes when adding a ROS camera plugin (libgazebo_ros_camera.so)

content.raw:
Doesn't happen for me, but I have gazebo_ros_pkgs (jade-devel branch) cloned into my workspace so that might be a difference to your setup.

See screenshot (also showing I have the same package versions): https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B1hU91jkd7VwTTRVRnBPOUVURkU/view?usp=sharing
